def fun(lis,n):
    num=0
    flag=0
    ma=0
    for i in lis:
        num=num*10+int(i)
    for i in range(1,10,1):
        for j in range(0,10,1):
            if (i*10000+num*10+j)%n==0:
                flag=1
                ma=i*10000+num*10+j
    if flag==0:
        return "0"
    else:
        z=str(ma/n)
        w=str(ma)
        a=w[0]
        b=w[len(w)-1]
        m=a+" "+b+" "+z
        return m
x=input("")
m=list()
for i in range(0,x,1):
    s=input("")
    z=raw_input("")
    v=z.rsplit()
    k=fun(v,s)
    m.append(k)
for i in m:
    print i
